result.execSummary:
The defendant Myaka C Davis was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Carry Concealed Weapon, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
*Fine of $300.00 including all mandatory costs, fees and surcharges to be paid by 11/03/16 or serve 10 consecutive days in the HOC. 
*Defendant is to give a DNA sample.
Consecutive to: To any other sentence with credit for 39 days time served. No Huber privileges. Court objects to ES.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Myaka C Davis

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: F&C Commitment order returned by USPS as undeliverable

F&C Commitment issued for failure to pay as ordered.
10 days HOC, consecutive.
DUE & OWING

Defendant Myaka C Davis in court with attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez.  Defendant Myaka C Davis in custody.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waived rights and pled guilty.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire received and filed.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Parties stipulate to the facts of the complaint as a basis for a guilty plea.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the complaint.  Judgment of Conviction entered. 

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant. 

The Court ordered the Defendant to serve four months  in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence with credit for 39  days time served.   No Huber privileges.   Court objects to ES. 

Fine of $300.00 including all mandatory  costs , fees and surcharges to be paid from bail on deposit or balance due by 11-3-16 or serve 10 consecutive days in the House of Correction.

Defendant is to give a DNA sample.

Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.
Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 47

Attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez in court, defendant Myaka C Davis not in court, in custody.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense motion to modify bail argued and DENIED by the Court. Bail: $250.00 CASH and all other conditions to remain. 
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.
TOT JUSTICE POINT. SAME TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS PREVIOUSLY ORDERED

Attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez in court, defendant Myaka C Davis not in court, in custody.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter before the Court for Pre-trial conference.  Defense requests date for possible resolution of this matter.  The Court orders bail modified to $250.00 CASH, SAME TERMS.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/DEFENDANT to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.   
No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription, and no alcohol.
Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Myaka C Davis in court with attorney Robert J. Hampton.  Defendant Myaka C Davis in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin. LM

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 8, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Myaka C Davis
Current: 5839 N 84TH APT 3, Milwaukee, WI 53205   (Effective: 10-01-2015)
Prior: 2041 North 24th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53205
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Myaka C Davis not in court.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.  Court makes finding that there is no possible victim identified, therefore, recompense is not an issue.vb
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 09-11-2015 at 01:30pm
Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff: 07/21/2015
